LongDescription:
TUNNEL RECONSTRUCTION | Until Saturday, Jun 23, 2018
Weekend [2] [3] station closures and route changes


Normal weekend service is scheduled to resume 12:01 AM Sunday, Jun 24, 2018.

No service at Park Place, Wall St, Clark St and Hoyt St; use nearby [4] [5] stations

No [2] [3] service between Manhattan and Brooklyn; take the [4] or [5] instead.

Free out-of system transfer is available between South Ferry [1] [2] and Bowling Green [4] [5].

Weekend service map for Lower Manhattan and Downtown Brooklyn

TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jun 23, Saturday, 12:01 AM to 6 AM
New Lots Av-bound [4] trains skip 116, 110, 103, 96, 77, 68 and 51 Sts in Manhattan


For service to these stations, take the [4] to 59 St or Grand Central-42 St
and transfer to an uptown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 59 St or 125 St and transfer to a
New Lots Av-bound [4].

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between uptown and downtown trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at 86 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

[E] Trains run via the [F] in both directions between W 4 St, Manhattan and 21 St-Queensbridge [F] Station, Queens


No [E] service at Queens Plaza, Court Sq-23 St, Lexington Av/53 St, 5 Av/53 St, 7 Av, 50 St,
42 St/Port Authority, 34 St-Penn Station, 23 St and 14 St.

[SB] Free shuttle buses operate between Court Sq-23 St and 21 St-Queensbridge, stopping at
Queens Plaza.

Travel Alternatives
For Queens Plaza, take the [R] (days/evenings) or use the nearby Queensboro Plaza [7] [N] Station or [SB]. Transfer at 34 St-Herald Sq [N] [R] or Roosevelt Av-74 St [7] [R].

For Court Sq-23 St, use the [7] via Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority or via transfer at Roosevelt Av.

For Lexington Av/53 St, use the [4] local, [6] via transfer to/from the [7] at Grand Central or [R] (days/evenings) at Lexington Av/59 St.

For 5 Av/53 St, use nearby [F] stations at 57 St or 47-50 Sts.

For 7 Av, take the [D], transfer at 47-50 Sts.

For 50, 42, 34, 23 and 14 Sts, take the [A] [C]. Transfer at W 4 St or from the [7] or [N] trains at Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority.

your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

STRUCTURAL IMPROVEMENTS | 9:30 PM Fri, Jun 22 to 5 AM Mon, Jun 25
No [G] trains between Hoyt-Schermerhorn and Church Av in Brooklyn
Service operates in two sections

[A] [F] trains provide alternate service

No [G] service at Bergen, Carroll, Smith-9 Sts, 4 Av-9 St, 7 Av, 15 St-Prospect Park,
Fort Hamilton Pkwy and Church Av. Take the [F] instead.

• Transfer between [A] and [G] trains at Hoyt-Schermerhorn.
• Transfer between [A] and [F] trains at Jay St-MetroTech.

[G] service operates in two sections:
 1. Between Court Sq and Bedford-Nostrand Avs
 2. Between Bedford-Nostrand Avs and Hoyt-Schermerhorn, every 20 minutes.

• Transfer at Bedford-Nostrand Avs to continue your trip.
